item.project_zero_limit.oni_mask.tooltip: §8Forged as a prison for a fallen Oni warlord, the mask carries fragments of his soul.
§8Each power it grants is a shard of his wrath and defiance, but every use draws the
§8wearer closer to corruption until mask and mortal become one.
item.project_zero_limit.red_gem.tooltip_: This gem burns with the pure fury of the Oni warlord. It’s said to be the crystallized heart of his wrath, still
beating faintly within its core. When held close, you can hear distant battle cries and the echo of flames.
item.project_zero_limit.orange_gem.toolt: A gem born from the Oni’s passion and relentless ambition. It glows softly like the embers of a dying forge,
said to represent the Oni’s will to rise again.
item.project_zero_limit.yellow_gem.toolt: Said to be a shard of the Oni’s mind, this gem pulses with strange patterns of light — both beautiful and
unsettling. It represents awareness and vision beyond mortal understanding.
item.project_zero_limit.green_gem.toolti: This gem embodies the Oni’s lingering connection to nature — twisted, corrupted life energy still yearning
for growth. The gem pulses like a living organ.
item.project_zero_limit.blue_gem.tooltip: A calm gem representing the Oni’s lost tranquility — the moment before his rage was unleashed. The crystal
item.project_zero_limit.purple_gem.toolt: The final and most dangerous gem — said to hold the Oni’s true essence, the pure corruption that defied
even the gods. Its light swirls like a miniature galaxy, devouring the glow around it.
